name: Formula Racing 2D
description:
Compete against 20 formula racing cars in one of the best top-down GP racing games.

CHAMPIONSHIP MODE
Create your own championship and race for the title.

SINGLE RACES
Select your favorite race track for some fast top down racing.

EVENT MODE
Compete in a series of fixed career events.

SEASON MODE
Race a full career of 4 seasons and get contract offers.

Formula Racing 2D features:
• Up to 20 formula racing cars on track
• 23 different international race tracks (normal, city and desert races)
• Pit stop, qualifying and weather options
• Visual masterpiece: detailed and realistic 2D racing tracks
• Experience driving in the highest class of open wheel motorsport racing
• Formula GP racing simulator in a retro style

Accept the challenge, become a formula racing legend!
